title: distinguished member
body:
I think I deserve it. I've been here since day one of boards, and within the first week of forums.
I probably have more posts under my belt, across all accounts, than anyone else currently from OCE currently on boards.
you might try to argue that all i do is shitposting so I don't deserve it, but that's exactly why I do deserve. I'm a distinguished shitposter.
anyone that disagrees is a racist bigot btw.

oh also unban my main plox, its been perma'd for like 18 months now.

replies.body: tbh i miss the forums days when shitposting was a recognised art. hit me up with that distinguished shitposter too riot games, or else ur xenophobic and not inclusive of others' interests

http://puu.sh/tQiFf/f5d80c16b1.jpg
explain this riot
you can't fucking hide my threads from everyone. this is absolute bullshit.
Wtf? I can't see half of those posts on my boards home?
He has it sorted by "Hot". I have mine sorted by "Recent" so it's completely different.

It would appear that I am in fact a bit of a dullard xD

Thank you for enlightening me yet again, oh glorious president :3
It always takes me a second too.
Man you guys are talking in ancient times... pre 2010...
Molendo's road to gold. Distinguished due to being so famous pre-boards.
Now matter how 'distinguished' of a shitposter you may be, you will never reach the heights marked by frontiers such as Elo Satan and Molendo.
and sackboy at his prime

If you deserved Distinguished because you've been on the boards and forums then so do I.
I've been active on both and even participated in "GD" events that we used to host (I think I should help bring that back)

Heck, I still think I should be an instructor (The blue guys)
As I have been helping others for bloody ages.

But, you wont get purple, and I wont get P or B.
There are other categories to fill.
one being, no cursing and all that stuff (Which I'm pretty sure is the only thing I fail in)
and other things but I can't be bothered posting about the 10 things you need.
you just need to be a riot shill. even i was offered a spot my dude.

> [{quoted}](name=Yasei Doubutsu,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=qfgKx073,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2017-02-06T09:21:43.123+0000)
>
> If you deserved Distinguished because you've been on the boards and forums then so do I.
> I've been active on both and even participated in "GD" events that we used to host (I think I should help bring that back)
> 
> Heck, I still think I should be an instructor (The blue guys)
> As I have been helping others for bloody ages.
> 
> But, you wont get purple, and I wont get P or B.
> There are other categories to fill.
> one being, no cursing and all that stuff (Which I'm pretty sure is the only thing I fail in)
> and other things but I can't be bothered posting about the 10 things you need.

i've participated in GD events, i've been an active on both boards, forums, and in the chatroom. oh also I'm the current owner of the GD club, not that that means anything.
Give 'distinguished bronze' title, to all the people who complain about bronze trolls and afks :^), also make this guy distinguished shitposter :)
why tho?

I think it's safe to say that I'll get distinguished before you do.

Just saying.

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=qfgKx073,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-02-06T01:00:48.864+0000)
>
> I think it's safe to say that I'll get distinguished before you do.
> 
> Just saying.

i know, and it's bullshit.
why tho?
Viva le Tomat0

eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeey
We might be the only two people on the internet who know 'rogue' isn't spelt rouge.
Nice to know I'm not alone.
lol

> oh also unban my main plox, its been perma'd for like 18 months now.

rekt
